content.question: In this passage, the speaker tries to reassure the addressee. Write out and translate the Latin words that contain two of the reassuring remarks that the speaker says. Briefly explain why these remarks are reassuring.

frqParts.text: In this passage, the speaker tries to reassure the addressee. Write out and translate the Latin words that contain two of the reassuring remarks that the speaker says. Briefly explain why these remarks are reassuring.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 3.A: Develop an interpretation of a Latin text.
